params.config: The CollateralConfiguration object describing the new configuration. Requirements: - `ERC2771Context._msgSender()` must be the owner of the system. Emits a {CollateralConfigured} event.

params.collateralType: The address for the collateral whose configuration is being queried.

returns.collateral: The configuration object describing the given collateral.

getCollateralConfigurations(bool).details: Optionally returns only those that are currently enabled.

params.hideDisabled: Wether to hide disabled collaterals or just return the full list of collaterals in the system.

returns.collaterals: The list of collateral configuration objects set in the system.

params.collateralType: The address for the collateral whose price is being queried.

returns.priceD18: The price of the given collateral, denominated with 18 decimals of precision.

configureCollateral((bool,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates or updates the configuration for the given `collateralType`.

deprecateCollateral(address,address).notice: Deprecates a collateral and transfers the remaining balance in the v3 system to the specified receiver contract.

getCollateralConfiguration(address).notice: Returns detailed information pertaining the specified collateral type.

getCollateralConfigurations(bool).notice: Returns a list of detailed information pertaining to all collateral types registered in the system.

getCollateralPrice(address).notice: Returns the current value of a specified collateral type.
